text:
HackerRank | https://www.hackerrank.com | Bangalore | Fulltime

Our goal: match every developer to the right job!

We are building the developer DNA for every job and recommending developers from our 2M+ community to the right job.

It's a really exciting problem and we are poised to take over the recruiting space. More info here: https://boards.greenhouse.io/hackerrank/jobs/524311?gh_jid=5...

You can also email me: vivek [at] hackerrank directly for more info.
